name: WordPress Comments Import & Export
author: WebToffee

sections.description:
WordPress Comments Import & Export Plugin helps you to easily export and import article/post comments of your WordPress site. It is super simple!

Features

✅ Bulk import/export comments for all or filtered posts.
✅ Bulk update comments
✅ Filtering options while export- by article, start date, end date and limit.
✅ Import/export discussions using using WooDiscuz and wpDiscuz plugins.
✅ Export and download comments right from the WordPress admin comments listing page.
✅ Import and export comments from/to remote location via FTP.
✅ Enable automatic scheduled scheduled import/export of comments.

Discover the finest WordPress WooCommerce Extensions – WebToffee.com.

Highlights: Simply Export Comments, Customer Comments CSV Export, Export Comments to Excel. Best WordPress Comments Export Plugin in Market.

How does it work?

The WordPress Comments Import and Export plugin takes CSV (Comma-Separated Values) file as input. You must create a CSV file and enter the Comments details in a structured format as explained in the tutorial. This is to match each field of CSV file to the field of a particular Comment that otherwise Admin need to input manually.

You can create the CSV from scratch or you can export the Comment to get the format of CSV. You can use a spreadsheet program, such as Microsoft Excel, or Google Spreadsheets for creating and modifying the CSV file. Save this file with extension.CSV. After entering all details about comments in a spreadsheet, you can import comments to your online store. With this plugin, you can also export and download comment details as a CSV file.
With this Plugin, You can also export and import WooDiscuz Discussions (comments).

Please refer the documentation for more detailed help.

Import/Export/Migration Plugins for WooCommerce from WebToffee

Other useful plugins from WebToffee for migrating WooCommerce/WordPress data:

🔸 WooCommerce Product Import Export Plugin: Easily import and export products to/from your WooCommerce store using a CSV file.
🔸 WooCommerce Order/Coupon/Subscription Import Export: The plugin lets you export and import orders and coupons via CSV to and from your WooCommerce store.
🔸 Import Export WordPress Users/Customers: Import and export the users in WordPress and customers in your WooCommerce store using a CSV file with the help of this plugin.
🔸 WordPress Backup & Migration: Quickly migrate and backup your entire WordPress site or selected files from one location to another. Backup to FTP, Google drive, Amazon S3 or local storage and easily restore them back.
🔸 WebToffee WooCommerce Product Feed & Sync Manager: Generate WooCommerce product feed for Google and Facebook shops and sync WooCommerce products with Facebook catalog.

About WebToffee.com

WebToffee creates quality WordPress/WooCommerce/WooDiscuz plugins that are easy to use and customize. We are proud to have thousands of customers actively using our plugins across the globe.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it ! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin export article specific comments?

Yes. You can export comments for specific article.

Does this plugin support automatic comment import and export?

Yes. You can schedule automatic import and export via FTP.

Does this plugin support the import of product comments/reviews?

No. The plugin only supports the import and export of post/article comments. For the import and export of product reviews you may install this free plugin Product Import Export for WooCommerce.

sections.reviews:
Gut aber unvollständig

By trubinwordpress on November 11, 2023

Das Tool funktionirt unkompliziert und rasch. Leider werden die Antworten auf Kommentare nicht übertragen.

Works even better than expected

By Bulat2 on August 10, 2023

Exported and then imported comments to our new website. Due to the CSV format, it was possible to change posts (to which comments are added) when needed.

Perfect !

By lolo42 on August 9, 2023

It's been a long time since I used it to migrate my site. As far as I can remember, it worked very well.

It works as expected.

By Matthias Honert on June 26, 2023

Thank you for your excellent Plugin!

great plugin

By Stanko (stanko) on May 22, 2023

works great and does what it supposed to do - thank you sooo much

Does the job well

By krowb53 on May 11, 2023

I needed to export a comment from a backup site to the original site. This plugin did what I needed

Excellent tool, easy to use

By zacharyzhang098 on February 23, 2023

It helps me easily manage thousands of posts.

Worked among 4 different hosts - past 12 months

By JEFF BAYGENTS (jeffbaygents) on January 4, 2023

I've been in IT Management and Consulting for over 30 years. This is so incredibly functional and stable, it's unreal. It even includes a field mapping feature (optional to use) that takes into account if you're importing into a different system that uses different field names from the old one. That is the precise sign of a detail-oriented developer, as well as taking the user into consideration under differing scenarios. I've used successfully between 4 hosts: Siteground, Cloudways Vultr, Rocket.net, and HostArmada.

No Bullshit! Works in just 2 Clicks

By Mohammed Asif suhaib (asifsuhaib) on December 28, 2022

Easiest migration i ever witnessed.

Preciso

By julius70 on November 28, 2022

Es el mejor plugin para la tarea en cuestión. Lo necesitaba para exportar los comentarios por entrada. Las nuevas entradas tienen distinto ID y nombre, pude importar los comentarios sin problema.
